### Solicitation Details

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a vendor to supply, deliver, and install one benchtop WDXRF spectrometer to the National Research Council of Canada (NRC). The scope of work involves delivering and installing the spectrometer to the following address: 100 Sussex Dr, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0R6, Canada.

### Important Deadlines

The tender closing date for submitting bids is 2022-10-04T14:00:00. It is essential to note that any bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

### Mandatory Requirements

Bidders must meet the mandatory requirements outlined in the Request for Proposal document, which includes compliance with the Labour and Scientific Equipment (41100000) and Spectroscopic Equipments (41115400) standards.

### Notice URL

For further information and to access the Request for Proposal document, please visit the Ariba Discovery platform at: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14112848?extsite=MTQxMTI4NDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
